```{r read-data}
# clean the data set
crime <- read.csv("Data/SYB62_328_201904_Intentional Homicides and Other Crimes.csv") %>%

  rename(Country = x_t12, Year = x, Series = x_1, Value = x_2, footnotes = x_3, Source = x_4)

tourism_clean <- tourism[-1,]
```
